Object.Field: COMPONENT NAME: IKM Hive Append AUTHOR: Oracle COMPONENT VERSION: 1 COMPATIBILITY: ODI 12.1.3.0.1 and above DESCRIPTION: This KM integrates data into a Hive target table in append or replace (truncate) mode.
Check this option if you wish to create the target table
Set this option to true, if you wish to replace the target table content with the new data.
